00011 enum player_actions{
00012 PA_X, PA_Y,
00013 PA_JUMP, PA_POGO,
00014 PA_FIRE, PA_STATUS
00015 };
00016 #define PA_MAX_ACTIONS 6
00017 
00018 // upon starting to walk, keen will quickly increase to
00019 // PFASTINCMAXSPEED. keen can, at a slower rate,
00020 // reach up to PMAXSPEED (increased every walk anim frame)
00021 #define PFASTINCRATE     4        // accel delay rate up to PFASTINCMAXSPEED
00022 #define PFASTINCRATE_POGO  2      // rate when pogo stick is out
00023 // rates at which player slows down while he is walking suddenly player does not
00024 // move him anymore
00025 #define PFRICTION_RATE_INAIR      2
00026 //#define PFRICTION_RATE_ONGROUND   7
00027 #define PFRICTION_RATE_ONGROUND   14
00028 #define PFRICTION_RATE_WM         32
00029 // rate at which player walking animation is shown
00030 #define PWALKANIMRATE             8
00031 
00032 // at STOPWALKING time after starting the exit door animation,
00033 // keen stops walking and we go to LEVEL_DONE_WAIT.
00034 #define LEVEL_DONE_STOPWALKING_TIME      100
00035 // at TOTAL_WAIT_TIME, LEVEL_DONE_FADEOUT is initiated.
00036 #define LEVEL_DONE_TOTAL_WAIT_TIME       200
00037 
00038 // speed at which player walks through the exit door
00039 #define PMAXEXITDOORSPEED       12
00040 
00041 // various states we go through when a level is completed
00042 // to do the walking out the exit door animation
00043 enum levelstate{
00044  LEVEL_NOT_DONE,            // not completed
00045  LEVEL_DONE_WALK,           // walking through exit door
00046  LEVEL_DONE_WAIT,           // finished walk through door, wait a bit
00047  LEVEL_DONE_FADEOUT,        // fading out
00048  LEVEL_COMPLETE,            // on to the next level!
00049  LEVEL_TELEPORTER     // Happens when Bonus Teleporter in Level was used
00050 };
00051 
00052 enum jumpstate{
00053  // the various jump states
00054  PNOJUMP,                        // not jumping
00055  PPREPAREJUMP,                   // doing the jump animation
00056  PJUMPUP,                        // jumping
00057  PJUMPED,                        // Player has jumped
00058  PJUMPLAND,                      // When player is in the middle of the air
00059  PPREPAREPOGO,                   // "pogo compressed" anim frame
00060  PPOGOING                        // pogoing
00061 };
00062 
00063 // the different jumping frames. when CTRL is held down the player will
00064 // go from frame PPREPAREJUMPFRAME to PJUMP_PREPARE_LAST_FRAME at a rate
00065 // of PJUMP_PREPARE_ANIM_RATE until either CTRL is released or the player
00066 // reaches the last frame. How far he got will select one of the various
00067 // jump heights, defined below.
00068 #define PPREPAREJUMPFRAME        8
00069 #define PJUMP_PREPARE_LAST_FRAME 13
00070 #define PJUMP_PREPARE_ANIM_RATE  1
00071 
00072 // time to show player in his "pogo compressed" frame before jumping
00073 #define PPOGO_PREPARE_TIME       10
00074 
00075 #define PSTANDFRAME     0  // standing, looking right
00076 #define PFIREFRAME               20     // raygun frame index
00077 #define PFIRE_SHOWFRAME_TIME     25    // minimum time to show raygun frame
00078 #define PFIRE_LIMIT_SHOT_FREQ    7     // maximum speed player can shoot
00079 #define PFIRE_LIMIT_SHOT_FREQ_FA 12     // fully automatic version
00080 
00081 // player frame indexes for world map
00082 #define PMAPRIGHTFRAME   32
00083 #define PMAPDOWNFRAME    36
00084 #define PMAPLEFTFRAME    40
00085 #define PMAPUPFRAME      44
00086
